channel.title: download & install Source SDK base 2007 offline
channel.description: I've searched and haven't seen this asked or answered. I'm bandwidth restricted at home (5 gb per month). I downloaded the game itself at a friends, then installed at home. Anyway to do that with the Source SDK base 2007? download it somewhere else, then install at home? Thanks!

item.title: download & install Source SDK base 2007 offline
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Ah, I know the pain of a bandwidth cap.
You can’t install the SDK offline, technically, but what you could try is beginning the install, pausing the download and going offline right after, download the content via steam elsewhere, then move that content from the other computer to yours, then reconnect to steam to finish the install once the content is in. I have done this transfer process many times to save bandwidth, and aside from occasionally having to install updates, it’s a painless procedure.

Read full topic
item.source: download & install Source SDK base 2007 offline
